name: Baldi's Basics, but you only need 1 notebook.
name_original: Baldi's Basics, but you only need 1 notebook.
description:
ok so this mod was to easy to make. it was my first time "coding" without a tutorial. in fact, theres a whole tutorial explaining how i made it, even that took longer amount of time to make than this mod entirely. all i did was delete the doors, change what i thought looked right in the code, baked the navmesh, and done. you have this mod. 

READ THIS PART: now the characters dont activate becuase you need to get 2 notebooks, which you can do... but it ruins the fun in the mod. AND IF YOU WANT TO BEAT IT WITH 1 NOTEBOOK, YOU NEED TO GET ALL THE QUESTIONS WRONG ON THE 1ST ONE!!!!!! also, you can roam around the school freely until you decide to get that 1 notebook. ill probably add an update that blocks all the walls off so you dont get more than 1 notebook. with all that out of the way, try to enjoy!
